body.name: Azgqswr Smart Watch for Men(Answer/Dial Calls), 5ATM Waterproof, 1.96''HD Rugged Tactical Fitness Watch for Android iOS iPhones with 100+Sport Modes,Heart Rate,Sleep Monitor (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 8 hrs 20 mins
features: 【Military-Standard quality】Men's Military Smart Watch is equipped with a 1.96-inch high-definition large screen with a high resolution of 240x280, which provides you with a better visual experience and a smoother operating experience.The Smart Watch is made from a special aluminum alloy material, our Military Smart Watch for Men has undergone rigorous military-grade testing, including extreme temperature, low pressure, and dust resistance. This watch can withstand harsh environmental conditions, making it the perfect companion for outdoor adventures.

【24H HEART RATE MONITORING & SLEEP TRACKING】- This fitness tracker provides health monitoring functions such as 24-hour real-time heart rate detection, blood oxygen, and sleep quality monitoring.Sedentary reminder, drinking water reminder functions and stress testing prompt you to remain active and stay hydrated throughout the day, You can learn about your physical health through monitoring feedback data, and at the same time allow you to develop good health habits (Note: It cannot be compared with hospital equipment, not medical equipment!!)

【Convenient Call and Message Functions 】- This smartwatch with text and call features high-quality speakers that support making and receiving calls and even playing music (please make sure you have successfully connected your watch's audio Bluetooth). The smartwatch with text and call capabilities will appear on your wrist and vibrate when you receive calls and messages (like Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, etc.), so you never miss an important call or message again.

【100+SPORTS MODES & FITNESS TRACKERS】- This step counter watch supports multiple sports modes, which include Walking, running, basketball, football, cycling, rope skipping, mountain climbing, etc. The reference data of the exercise will be uploaded to the APP, set a goal for your exercise, and work hard to achieve it!this smart watch has multiple sports modes to cater to your specific workout needs. The military smartwatch also provides you with more useful functions such as weather forecasts, alarm clocks, camera controllers, music control, sedentary reminder, and more.

【Wide Compatibility】Our Bluetooth calling smartwatch is compatible with most iOS 9.0 and Android 6 and later smartphones, and supports iPhone, Samsung, Huawei, Xiaomi, OnePlus, etc. (Not for PC, iPad, and Tablet). We offer a one-year quality guarantee for military watches. If you encounter any problems while using this product, please contact us by email and we will definitely help you solve the problem.
No Standalone lithium batteries are sold with the product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, Easy to use, And Powerful.
reviews.reviewText: I bought it out of curiosity, because it has a very good price, but it met my expectations, price-benefit. Very good smart watch, I am happy with my purchase, easy to use, and very practical. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s bigger than I anticipated but now that I have it on I’m obsessed!! It’s absolutely cute! and comfy and looks super stylish! Super easy to program and connect and works amazing! It’s touchscreen, connects to your phone easily and even though u can’t send messages from your watch you can still get them and make calls! I’m in love!! I’m buying two more for each of my parents and another for my husband and even one for my teenager!! Perfect buy!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Smartwatch at a great price
reviews.reviewText: For me the most important aspects are a good step counter, activity tracker, message and email notifications, excellent battery life and solid construction and water resistance. Happy to report it checks all these boxes and more. The voice assistant functionality works great with my iPhone 13. Will try to do an update as I spend more time with the device … but at this point it has already met or exceeded expectations. Two thumbs way up! (I purchased on sale for $28 USD all in)Update… I compared the health sensors for heart rate and pulse ox and the watch seems to be as accurate as other devices I compared it with. After 8 days of use there is still 25% battery available … excellent battery life with this device. I have worn this watch in the shower and various other water activities with no issues whatsoever … this watch has excellent water resistance capabilities. Very happy with this purchase. Only downside… I wish it wasn’t quite so big/bulky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: i love the watch. it is easy to setup and stay in charge for long

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Straight out the box wonderful. Everything works and easy to connect. And I have bought smart watches before but this the only one with the phone calling feature really works. Going to order some more in different colors. Great buy and price. I have spend a lot more on junk. This is the real deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great watch, I’ve had watches including Apple Watch and as far as I’m concerned it is a better watch for me. What do you have to lose!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Was good until
reviews.reviewText: I thought this product was awesome…until the battery ran out now it quit charging. This was going to be the third time charging the watch and it’s completely dead. I know it’s a 35 dollar smart watch so it’s not gonna last forever but I was hoping more than a month. This was a Christmas present from my kids. They are going to be rather upset when I tell them I can’t even contact the manufacturer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Excellent Smartwatch (Robert)
reviews.reviewText: Before making any decisions on purchasing products I always read reviews. This is an outstanding smart watch for the money. Functional and informative. I recommend this watch.
